entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
